Nerangs.ab: pas digar āb rā be-pādyāvi kardan be-dast šostan va barsom bist-o se tā be-aivyanghan gašte be-dast-e čab gereftan barsom-čin bā dast-e rāst gereftan pāk šostan va barsom-čin sar-e yek šāh-e barsom gereftan pas xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vohū se frauuarāne gāh-e hāvan frasastaiiaēca ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xvarənaŋᵛhatō xšnaoθra y. v. x f. yaϑā ahū vairiiō zaotā OD mraotū

"Then, he should purify the water and wash his hands. He should take the barsom tied with the aivyanghan with the left hand and the barsom-čin with the right. He should purify them and hold the barsom-čin on the end of a branch of the barsom. Then, he shoud recite xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ and three Aṣ̌əm Vohū and the Frauuarāne with the gāh hāvan (and the šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xvarənaŋᵛhatō xšnaoθra. y. v. x f. (and the wāz-gīrišnīh) yaϑā ahū vairiiō zaotā until mraotū."
ke barsom šostan fe gāh-e hāvan šuyand aṣ̌əm vohū se frauuarāne hāuuanə̄e ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛatō xšnaōθra yas. v. x. f. u-š vāǧ frāǧ girešn

"When he should wash the barsom, they wash it at the gāh hāvan. (He should recite) tree Aṣ̌əm Vohūs and the Frauuarāne (for the gāh) hāuuanə̄e and (with the šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛatō xšnaōθra yas. v. x. f. He has to take the vāǧ."

Quotations.ab: aṣ̌əm vohū sē frauuarānē mazdaiiasnō gāh ān ī bawēd ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō xšnaoθra tā frasastaiiaēca wāz frāz gīrišnīh
"(He should recite) three Aṣ̌əm Vohūs, the frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh (and with the šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō xšnaoθra until frasastaiiaēca and the wāz-gīrišnīh"
